name: Power Grid
uniques: Comment [Enable this city's industries and citizens to consume [Power], which enables Industry and ['Infrastructure'] buildings to increase overall gain based on electricity surplus]
Consumes [1] [Power] <in cities with between [0] and [5] [Population]> <hidden from users>
Consumes [2] [Power] <in cities with between [5] and [10] [Population]> <hidden from users>
Consumes [3] [Power] <in cities with between [10] and [15] [Population]> <hidden from users>
Consumes [4] [Power] <in cities with between [15] and [20] [Population]> <hidden from users>
Consumes [5] [Power] <in cities with between [20] and [25] [Population]> <hidden from users>
Consumes [6] [Power] <in cities with between [25] and [30] [Population]> <hidden from users>
Consumes [7] [Power] <in cities with between [30] and [35] [Population]> <hidden from users>
Consumes [8] [Power] <in cities with between [35] and [40] [Population]> <hidden from users>
Consumes [9] [Power] <in cities with between [40] and [45] [Population]> <hidden from users>
Consumes [10] [Power] <in cities with between [45] and [50] [Population]> <hidden from users>
Consumes [11] [Power] <in cities with between [50] and [55] [Population]> <hidden from users>
Consumes [12] [Power] <in cities with between [55] and [60] [Population]> <hidden from users>
Consumes [13] [Power] <in cities with between [60] and [65] [Population]> <hidden from users>
Consumes [14] [Power] <in cities with between [65] and [70] [Population]> <hidden from users>
Consumes [15] [Power] <in cities with between [70] and [75] [Population]> <hidden from users>
Consumes [16] [Power] <in cities with between [75] and [80] [Population]> <hidden from users>
Consumes [17] [Power] <in cities with between [80] and [85] [Population]> <hidden from users>
Consumes [18] [Power] <in cities with between [85] and [90] [Population]> <hidden from users>
Consumes [19] [Power] <in cities with between [90] and [95] [Population]> <hidden from users>
Consumes [20] [Power] <in cities with between [95] and [100] [Population]> <hidden from users>

name: Fossil Fuel Power Plant
uniques: [+1 Production] from [Natural Gas] tiles [in this city]
Provide [4] [Power] <when above [1] [Fuel]> <in cities with [Gas Storage and Transfer System]>
Provide [4] [Power] <when above [1] [Fuel]> <in cities with [Gas Storage and Transfer System]>

name: Carbon Capture
uniques: [+10]% [Science] [in this city] <in cities with a [Fossil Fuel Plant]>
[+10]% [Culture] [in this city] <in cities with a [Fossil Fuel Plant]>
[-5]% [Production] [in this city] <in cities with a [Fossil Fuel Plant]>
Destroyed when the city is captured

name: Government Complex
uniques: [-20]% Unhappiness from [Population] [in this city] <in cities with a [Anarchist Ruling]>
Destroyed when the city is captured
